relation: They have a pool and gym.
The food is actually okay. Not the best but it's descent food.
I been living with my parents. I don't think that this college has dorms.
The classrooms are not too small nor too big.
Remember to use time management wisely. Remember to also pay attention to the letters of the classroom number when registering for classes.

It's actually a great college with a lot of resources such as tutoring or finding employment. Their programs are very helpful and the classes are great. The professors are also really nice and very understanding.

TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {355709=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC, 84913=I would say, results may vary with every professor. I've had some very lenient teachers and also very thorough teachers. Study hard and make every effort to get the grade you want and deserve. I was admitted into NYU for the fall 2012, though I worked very hard I had some really great professors., 182523=This is the best part of this school it's price cannot get any better , I pay about $1900 and I am taking 14 credits which makes me a full-time student at the moment. Most folks start off by paying $20000 and up for each semester and are inundated by debt once they graduate, here that is not case , you will be debt free by the time you get your degree., 315149=Affordable compared to most of the schools in the city. Small classes 20:1. You always know what classes you need to take.}

textAfterTable: Emily from Corona, NY 01/04/2012 Reviewer is A current student here. 3 out of 3 people found this review useful. 2 of 91 Categories Comments Great for these types of students I recommend BMCC for any type of student who is looking to become successful in life and are goal oriented,ambitious and determined. Tips for prospective students Do what you have to do and keep your head in the game. Bang for the buck Very good tuition rates. Am enjoying being here I enjoy being here. The environment is very clean and positive. Am learning a lot I definitely learned a lot from BMCC and this amazing college experience thus far.
